feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -23.0°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local snow squalls early this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 early this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
